Gute Literatur mit Step-by-Step Vorgehen für Real Life Data:




Daten können unter diesem Link downgeloaded werden:
"https://mba.tuck.dartmouth.edu/pages/faculty/ken.french/ftp/F-F_Research_Data_5_Factors_2x3_CSV.zip"

```{r}
getwd()

library(readr)
dt <- read_csv("F-F_Research_Data_5_Factors_2x3.csv",
               skip = 4, n_max = 743,
               col_names = c("Date", "Mkt_RF", "SMB", "HML", "RMW", "CMA", "RF"))
View(dt)

cor_matrix <- cor(dt[, c("Mkt_RF", "SMB", "HML", "RMW", "CMA")])
print(cor_matrix)

plot(dt$HML, dt$CMA)

```
